content.rendered:
Muhammad joined Regent College as an Hourly Paid Lecturer in October 2018 under the Bucks University partnership. After successful completion of his probation, he has been promoted to a full-time academic role as an Undergraduate program leader position in May 2019. He has successfully led the foundation year program in Business management continuously for two academic years with an outstanding result. Besides his DOS position currently leading the undergraduate programme of Bucks University and the University of Northampton

Before joining the Regent, Muhammad worked as a Lecturer, course coordinator, and Academic assessor in various Independent Higher education institutions in the UK. He has started the career in Teaching in the Higher education sector in 2010 after Graduating from Brunel University, London. Aside from this, he has served as an Internal Company Accountant and business consultant for various UK companies. Through the various academic research and real-life experiments, he possessed excellent knowledge in business operations, marketing, finance & investment, retailing, hospitality, and Travel & Tourism. Muhammad is devoting himself and working hard towards the vision of Regent which is Regent Hill University.

Subject Specialism

Global Business Strategy, Principle of Marketing, International Marketing, and International Business economics.

Research Interests

Consumer behaviour on virtual shopping, globalisation, cross-culture management, and International marketing strategy.
